net.canarymod.api.entity

Interface FallingBlock

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Entity

    public interface FallingBlock
extends Entity
    Falling Block wrapper
    Author:
    Jason (darkdiplomat)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean dropsItem()
      Gets if when the entity finishes falling if it turns into a Block or drops an Item
      Block getBlock()
      Gets the Block (state) of the FallingBlock
      short getBlockID()
      Deprecated. 
      use getBlock() instead
      short getBlockMetaData()
      Deprecated. 
      metadata is no longer used, use getBlock() instead
      float getDamageAmount()
      Gets the damage caused by the FallingBlock multiplied by the number of blocks fell
      int getFallTime()
      Gets the ticks that the entity has fallen.
      When it reaches 600, it stops.
      int getMaxDamage()
      Gets the maximum damage the Block can cause if it hits an Entity
      boolean hurtEntities()
      Gets if the entity will hurt entities
      boolean isBreakingAnvil()
      Gets if the fall will destroy the Anvil (if it is an Anvil)

      Sets the damage caused by the FallingBlock

      Sets if when the entity finishes falling if it turns into a Block or drops an Item

      Sets the amount of time the entity has fallen.

      Sets if the entity will hurt entities
      void setIsBreakingAnvil(boolean breaking)
      Gets if the fall will destroy the Anvil (if it is an Anvil)
      If the blockID is not an Anvil, this has no effect.

      Sets the maximum damage the Block can cause if it hits an Entity

        int getFallTime()
        Gets the ticks that the entity has fallen.
        When it reaches 600, it stops.
        Returns:

      • dropsItem

        boolean dropsItem()
        Gets if when the entity finishes falling if it turns into a Block or drops an Item
        Returns:
        true if drops Item; false if turns into a Block

      • setDropsItem

        void setDropsItem(boolean drops)
        Sets if when the entity finishes falling if it turns into a Block or drops an Item
        Parameters:
        drops - true if drops Item; false if turns into a Block

      • isBreakingAnvil

        boolean isBreakingAnvil()
        Gets if the fall will destroy the Anvil (if it is an Anvil)
        Returns:
        true if breaking; false if not

      • setIsBreakingAnvil

        void setIsBreakingAnvil(boolean breaking)
        Gets if the fall will destroy the Anvil (if it is an Anvil)
        If the blockID is not an Anvil, this has no effect.
        Parameters:
        breaking - true if breaking; false if not

      • hurtEntities

        boolean hurtEntities()
        Gets if the entity will hurt entities
        Returns:
        true if hurts; false if not
